snippet.title: BloodDome99 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
15 years from now, in the distant year of 1999:

Ronald Reagan is midway through his fifth term. Under his economic oversight the rich have gotten richer while, for most people, the American dream has drifted farther and farther from reality.

Unable to afford healthcare or feed their own families many desperate Americans only have one option left: BloodDome 99

Fight for survival and glory in a blood drenched arena. Earn money and buy upgrades but be careful- every dollar spent brings you further from your goal: buying your freedom.

https://halftonegaming.itch.io/blooddome99
https://discord.gg/MCbpwWdjrU
